result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alphonso Michael Givens

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont appeared by video for Alphonso Michael Givens.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for return on doctor's report.  State does not dispute the findings, however the defense contests the report.   Case adjourned for contested doctors report hearing in Branch 40.
Competency hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont appeared by video for Alphonso Michael Givens.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for return on doctor's reports.  Defense requests more time to review reports with the defendant.  Court rescheduled hearing.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Received and Filed:  Doctor report dated 9-20-2022
Received and Filed:  Doctor Report dated 9-14-22

Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court for Alphonso Michael Givens.  Attorney Patrick O'Keefe in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for special plea hearing.  Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause, suspended proceedings, and ordered defendant examined by Wisconsin Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.  The Court also orders the defendant to be examined for NGI evaluation pursuant to Wis. Stats. 971.16(2).  Order Appointing Doctor signed and filed.  Court vacated jury trial scheduled for 9-06-2022.  Court ordered case adjourned for Return on the Doctor's Report in Branch 40.
Doctor's Report Return scheduled for September 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Court rescheduled plea hearing upon request from the defense. Parties notified of date.  This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/a8cc2343-9b62-c309-778f-fa846faecb6a.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Alphonso Michael Givens not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial. Defense requests a plea/sentencing date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Received and Filed:  Letter from examining doctor addressed to the Court.
Signed and filed:  Order for Examination
Received.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Alphonso Michael Givens not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Status Conference held.  Defense requests NGI examination to be conducted.  Court ordered Dr. Deborah Collins to do the examination.  Return on Doctor's Report will be held on the final pre-trial date.  Case adjourned to August 3, 2022 at 8:30 AM in Branch 40.
Court set status date upon the request of defense.  Parties notified of date.  Status date set for June 16, 2022 at 1:30 PM.

Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court, defendant Alphonso Michael Givens not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a status.  Court set final pretrial and jury trial dates upon request from the defense.  Defense acknowledges receipt of discovery.  Court ordered all substantive motions to be filed by June 24, 2022 and all responses to be filed by July 22, 2022 or they will be deemed waived.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Colin Patrick McGinn on behalf of Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont in court. Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens not in court, in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
CASE HELD OFF THE RECORD PER JUDGE.  Case in court for scheduling conference.  Defense requests a status date.  Court set date as requested.  Case adjourned to Branch 40.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling conference on May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Next court date has been changed from 4/29/2022 at 8:30am to 5/16/2022 at 8:30am as Br. 40 is down 4/29/2022. Parties are notified.

Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont; both appear by video.  Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a Preliminary Hearing. Parties are advised that this case is assigned to Branch 40, Judge Shelton. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court held colloquy with defendant. Probable cause has been found and the defendant is bound over for trial. Original Information e-filed, copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defense enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of the defendant. Case is adjourned to Br. 40.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.descr: DE competent to stand trial, suspension lifted

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in custody.  Patrick O'Keefe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for return on doctor's report.  Parties do not contest the report.   Court finds the defendant is competent to proceed and reinstates the proceedings.  Case adjourned for preliminart hearing and bail/bond hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 20, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed:  Doctor's Report dated 3-30-2022.

Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in court with Attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in custody.  Matthew Zisi appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Court is advised by the defense there is reason to believe the defendant is not competent to proceed.  Pursuant to Sec. 971.14 (2) Wisconsin Statutes, Court found probable cause and ordered defendant examined by the Forensic Unit.  Order for Examination, signed and filed.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for April 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed.
Oral No VIOLENT Contact Order with SJF.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in court with attorney Mary Garvin Guimont.  Defendant Alphonso Michael Givens in custody.  Francesco Mineo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Alphonso Michael Givens appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 24, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
